content: The book is intended to serve as a text for the course in analysis that is usually taken by advanced undergraduates or by first-year student who study mathematics.
这本书的目的是作为教材，分析课上的，经常被高年级本科生或学习数学的一年级学生所学习的那种。
The present edition covers essentially the same topics as the second one, with some additions, a few minor omissions, and considerable rearrangement.
当前版本基本覆盖了相同的主题，比较起第二版，有一些增加，一点小删减，以及相当的结构重组。
I hope that these changes will make the material more accessible and more attractive to the students who take such a course.
我希望这些改变使得内容更易读与更有吸引力，对于学生，上这样一个课的来说。
Experience has convinced me that it is pedagogically unsound (though logically correct) to start off with the construction of the real numbers from rational ones.
经验已经说服我这是教育方法意义上无效的（尽管逻辑正确），即开始从实数的构建从有理数。
Accordingly, the real number system is introduced as an ordered field with the least-upper-bound property, and a few interesting applications of this property are quickly made.
相应地，实数系统被引入以有序域，有最小上界属性的，以及一点这个属性的有趣应用很快作出。
At the beginning, most students simply fail to appreciate the need for doing this.
在开始，大多数学生简单地失败于欣赏这么做的需要。
However, Dedekind's construction is not omitted.
无论如何， 戴德金构造没有被省略。
It is now in an Appendix to Chapter 1, where it may be studied and enjoyed whenever the time seem ripe.
它现在在第一章的附录， 在那里可以被学习与享受在时机看上去成熟的时候。
The material on functions of several variables is almost completely rewritten, with many details filled in, and with more examples and more motivation.
多元函数部分几乎被完全重写了，有一些细节被填入，以及更多的例子与动机。
